name: md
content:
MD noun [C]
(ADDRESS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
written abbreviation for the US state of Maryland: used in addresses: Write to us at 7985 Arlington Road, Rockville, MD. The book is published by Littleford Publishers, Salisbury, MD.

MD noun [C]
(MANAGER)
UK abbreviation for
managing director : the person in charge of a company: You should talk to the MD about your proposal.

MD noun [C]
(EYES)
abbreviation for
macular degeneration : a condition in which the macula (= the central area of the retina in the eye) changes, resulting in a loss of central vision: My ophthalmologist told me that he saw no signs of MD. I don't know if my grandparents had MD, but both of my grandfathers did use magnifying glasses to read in their final years.
